      • render

        public void render(Request request,
          Response response,
          Appendable app,
          EntityUtil attributeEscaper,
          boolean outputErrorHandler,
          boolean xml)
            throws IOException
        Render to the appendable.
        Parameters:
        request - the request.
        response - the response.
        app - the appendable.
        attributeEscaper - escape util.
        outputErrorHandler - flag to output error handler. Should be on the last media source to be output.
        xml - xml serialization flag.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the appendable.
